script:
1). Have you noticed how few orders we've been getting recently?
A lot of people go on their annual holiday at this time of year.
I think we're both lucky we've still got jobs.
It's quite clear that we are undergoing a recession and so it's not surprising. 
2). It looks like we'll have to leave early today because we are due to have a long power cut soon.
It seems that we're running out of fuel in the power stations.
Good then I'll be able to finish putting up those shelves at home. 
The cost of gas and electricity seems to go up and up all the time.
3). Are we going to get our usual bonus this year, do you think?
I don't think it's realistic in view of the current downturn. 
I think I'm going to try to get a better paid job.
I realise it was a mistake to come and work here, there are no prospects.
